00100         return stopped;

00103 void Job::destroy(void) {
00104         int i;
00105         for (i = 0; i < process.size(); i++) {
00106                 process[i]->destroy();
00107                 delete process[i];
00108         }
00109         process.clear();
00110 }
00111 
00112 void Job::print (void) {
00113         int i, size;
00114         std::cout << '[' << id << "]\t";
00115         if (stopped)
00116                 std::cout << "Parado";
00117         else
00118                 std::cout << "Ativo";
00119         std::cout <<  "\t\t" << cmd << ' ' << (inBG()?'&':' ');
00120         std::cout << std::endl;
00121 }

00143 void Job::setProcessCommand(char** cmd, int size){
00144     process[process.size()-1]->setCommand(cmd, size);

00151 void Job::addFlag (int newflag) {
00152         flag |= newflag;

00155 bool Job::inBG(void) {
00156         return (flag & shooSH_BG) != 0;
00157 }
00158 
00159 bool Job::hasPipe (void) {
00160         return (flag & shooSH_PIPE) != 0;
00161 }
00162 
00163 bool Job::isNop (void) {
00164         return (flag & shooSH_NOP) != 0;
00165 }
00166 
00167 bool Job::hasFailed (void) {
00168         return (flag & shooSH_FAIL) != 0;
00169 }
00170 
00171 bool Job::hasExited (void) {
00172         return (flag & shooSH_EXIT) != 0;
00173 }
00174 
00175 void Job::setBG (bool isBG) {
00176         if (isBG)
00177                 flag |= (-1 & shooSH_BG);
00178         else
00179                 flag &= (0 & shooSH_BG);
00180 }
